  • Classes in org.apache.struts2.components.template used by org.apache.struts2.components
    Class
    Description
    Template
    A template is used as a model for rendering output.
    TemplateEngineManager
    The TemplateEngineManager will return a template engine for the template
  • Classes in org.apache.struts2.components.template used by org.apache.struts2.components.template
    Class
    Description
    BaseTemplateEngine
    Base class for template engines.
    Template
    A template is used as a model for rendering output.
    TemplateEngine
    Any template language which wants to support UI tag templating needs to provide an implementation of this interface to handle rendering the template
    TemplateRenderingContext
    Context used when rendering templates.
